input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='The GLD Shop Diamond Cuban Link Chain Size'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Silver Bracelet'
  - Name='CRAFTD London 8MM Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 3.5mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain | 22"'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Silver Chain | 26"'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Franco Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 24" Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Set | Chain 22"'
  - Name='JAXXON Youth Cuban Silver Chain Stack | 16"/18"'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Gold Chain Set, 22"'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Silver Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 24" Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Gold Chain | 24"'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link Gold Chain | 22"'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The GLD Shop Diamond Cuban Link Chain Size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link chain design but includes diamonds and no mention of size or silver material; less directly comparable in material and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Silver Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link style but different product type (bracelet vs chain) and different thickness (10mm vs 8mm).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London 8MM Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product type and gauge (8mm Cuban link chain) with a different metal (gold vs silver). Shares size and chain style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, size (8mm), and chain style but with an iced-out (diamond-style) finish and different metal (gold instead of silver).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet rather than chain, different thickness (5mm), iced-out finish, and gold metal, less relevant to the reference chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Set includes Cuban link pieces but different thickness (10mm) and gold iced-out finish; likely includes bracelet and chain, less direct match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Cuban Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Set with Cuban link chain(s); unclear thickness or metal but same style and brand, so moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 3.5mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain | 22"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link chain type but smaller thickness (3.5mm) and different metal (white gold), so less similar in build and style strength.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Silver Chain | 26"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical product type, size (8mm), metal (silver), style and brand; essentially the same product with length specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 3mm Franco Silver Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different chain style (Franco vs Cuban), much thinner (3mm), same metal but quite dissimilar in silhouette and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 24" Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link style but thickness and metal not specified; likely relevant but less specific match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Set | Chain 22"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same style (Cuban link), silver metal, thicker (10mm), and part of a set; related but less precise match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Youth Cuban Silver Chain Stack | 16"/18"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar brand, style, and metal, but aimed at youth with smaller sizes; less relevant to an adult 8mm chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Cuban Gold Chain Set, 22"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same style and brand but different metal (gold), and part of a set; reasonably similar product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Cuban Link Silver Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet rather than chain, same brand and style but different form factor and likely size, so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Cuban Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller thickness (5mm), brand and style match but quite different scale and may include multiple items.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 24" Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, style, metal, and length but is a set, slightly less specific singular product match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Gold Chain | 24"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Almost identical product differing primarily in metal color (gold vs silver), with same size and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and style but bigger thickness (10mm) and iced out finish, less like the simple 8mm silver chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thicker (10mm), iced out finish, gold metal; similar style and brand but more ornate and different thickness/material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same metal and iced out style but thicker (10mm vs 8mm); reasonably close but different thickness and finish.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link Gold Chain | 22"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes an 8mm Cuban link gold chain but bundled with a watch; same size but different metal and combined product.
